scripts.sync: npm run sync-vw && npm run sync-seat && npm run sync-skoda && npm run sync-audi
scripts.sync-vw: cd ../ && rm -rf ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && cd ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/com.we-volkswagen.connect.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone drivers/audi-ev drivers/audi-fuel drivers/audi-hybrid drivers/skoda-ev drivers/skoda-fuel drivers/skoda-hybrid drivers/seat-ev drivers/seat-fuel drivers/seat-hybrid
scripts.sync-seat: cd ../ && rm -rf ./com.seat.connectedcar && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./com.seat.connectedcar && cd ./com.seat.connectedcar && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/com.seat.connectedcar.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone drivers/audi-ev drivers/audi-fuel drivers/audi-hybrid drivers/skoda-ev drivers/skoda-fuel drivers/skoda-hybrid drivers/vw-ev drivers/vw-fuel drivers/vw-hybrid
scripts.sync-skoda: cd ../ && rm -rf ./cz.skodaauto.connect && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./cz.skodaauto.connect && cd ./cz.skodaauto.connect && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/cz.skodaauto.connect.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone drivers/audi-ev drivers/audi-fuel drivers/audi-hybrid drivers/seat-ev drivers/seat-fuel drivers/seat-hybrid drivers/vw-ev drivers/vw-fuel drivers/vw-hybrid
scripts.sync-audi: cd ../ && rm -rf ./de.myaudi.mobile.assistant && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./de.myaudi.mobile.assistant && cd ./de.myaudi.mobile.assistant && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/de.myaudi.mobile.assistant.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone drivers/seat-ev drivers/seat-fuel drivers/seat-hybrid drivers/skoda-ev drivers/skoda-fuel drivers/skoda-hybrid drivers/vw-ev drivers/vw-fuel drivers/vw-hybrid
scripts.publish-vw: yarn sync-vw && cd ../com.we-volkswagen.connect && homey app publish && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.publish-seat: yarn sync-seat && cd ../com.seat.connectedcar && homey app publish && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.publish-skoda: yarn sync-skoda && cd ../cz.skodaauto.connect && homey app publish && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.publish-audi: yarn sync-audi && cd ../de.myaudi.mobile.assistant && homey app publish && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.run-vw: yarn sync-vw && cd ../com.we-volkswagen.connect && homey app run && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.run-seat: yarn sync-seat && cd ../com.seat.connectedcar && homey app run && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.run-skoda: yarn sync-skoda && cd ../cz.skodaauto.connect && homey app run && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.run-audi: yarn sync-audi && cd ../de.myaudi.mobile.assistant && homey app run && cd ../com.vag.core
scripts.sync-dev: cd ../ && rm -rf ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && cd ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/com.we-volkswagen.connect.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone
